statements.statement: select KHODUOC_ID from TM_KHODUOC where MAKHO = '$MAKHO$'
select * from TT_VIENPHI where TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' AND HOADON_ID IS NOT NULL
select * from TT_HOADON order by HOADON_ID

select A.*, B.HUYHOADON as HUYHOANUNG from TT_HOADON A LEFT JOIN TT_HOADON B ON A.HOADONLIENQUAN_ID = B.HOADON_ID where A.DATHANHTOAN = '1' and A.TRANGTHAI = 'DATHUTIEN'
A.LOAIHOADON = '$LOAIHOADON$'
A.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
A.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
A.HUYHOADON = '$HUYHOADON$'
order by HOADON_ID

select A.* from TT_HOADON A LEFT JOIN TT_HOADON B ON A.HOADONLIENQUAN_ID = B.HOADON_ID where A.DATHANHTOAN = '1' and A.TRANGTHAI = 'DATHUTIEN' and A.HUYHOADON = '0'
A.LOAIHOADON = '$LOAIHOADON$'
A.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
A.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
order by HOADON_ID

select distinct A.*, B.SOHOADON AS HOADONLIENQUAN, bn.MAYTE , CASE NVL(TO_CHAR(BN.NGAYSINH),'') WHEN '' THEN TO_CHAR(BN.NAMSINH) ELSE TO_CHAR(BN.NGAYSINH, 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS NAMSINH , ntba.SOBENHAN, bn.TENBENHNHAN , ntba.TRANGTHAI as TRANGTHAINOITRU, tn.TRANGTHAI as TRANGTHAINGOAITRU, ntba.LOAIBENHAN from TT_HOADON A LEFT JOIN TT_HOADON B ON A.HOADONLIENQUAN_ID = B.HOADON_ID left join TT_VIENPHI VP on VP.HOADON_ID = A.HOADON_ID left join TT_TIEPNHAN tn on tn.TIEPNHAN_ID = a.TIEPNHAN_ID left join TT_BENHNHAN bn on (bn.BENHNHAN_ID = tn.BENHNHAN_ID or bn.BENHNHAN_ID = a.BENHNHAN_ID) left join TT_NOITRU_BENHAN ntba on ntba.TIEPNHAN_ID = a.TIEPNHAN_ID
A.DATHANHTOAN = '$DATHANHTOAN$' and (A.HUYHOADON is null or A.HUYHOADON = '0') and (A.HOANTRA is null or A.HOANTRA = '0')
A.HUYHOADON = '$HUYHOADON$'
A.HOANTRA = '$HOANTRA$'
A.DATHANHTOAN = 0
)
A.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
A.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
A.SOHOADON like '%$TUKHOA$%'
(bn.TENBENHNHAN like '%$TENBENHNHAN$%' or bn.MAYTE like '%$TENBENHNHAN$%')
trunc(A.NGAYHOADON) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)
A.TRANGTHAI = '$TRANGTHAI$'
(A.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$USER_ID$' or A.NGUOITAO_ID = '$USER_ID$')
A.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
(VP.REF_TABLE IS NULL OR VP.REF_TABLE not in ($LIST_REF_TABLE$))
VP.REF_TABLE in ($LIST_IN_REF_TABLE$)
order by A.NGAYHOADON

select distinct A.*, B.SOHOADON AS HOADONLIENQUAN, bn.MAYTE from TT_HOADON A LEFT JOIN TT_HOADON B ON A.HOADONLIENQUAN_ID = B.HOADON_ID left join TT_VIENPHI VP on VP.HOADON_ID = A.HOADON_ID left join TT_BENHNHAN bn on (bn.BENHNHAN_ID = a.BENHNHAN_ID) left join TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU_CHITIET ctct on ctct.CHUNGTUCHITIET_ID= vp.REF_ID left join TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU ct on ct.CHUNGTU_ID = ctct.CHUNGTU_ID
A.DATHANHTOAN = '$DATHANHTOAN$' and (A.HUYHOADON is null or A.HUYHOADON = '0') and (A.HOANTRA is null or A.HOANTRA = '0')
A.HUYHOADON = '$HUYHOADON$'
A.HOANTRA = '$HOANTRA$'
A.DATHANHTOAN = 0
)
A.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
A.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
A.SOHOADON like '%$TUKHOA$%'
(bn.TENBENHNHAN like '%$TENBENHNHAN$%' or bn.MAYTE like '%$TENBENHNHAN$%' or ct.TENBENHNHAN like '%$TENBENHNHAN$%')
TRUNC(A.NGAYHOADON) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)
A.TRANGTHAI = '$TRANGTHAI$'
(A.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$USER_ID$' or A.NGUOITAO_ID = '$USER_ID$')
A.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
(VP.REF_TABLE IS NULL OR VP.REF_TABLE not in ($LIST_REF_TABLE$))
VP.REF_TABLE in ($LIST_IN_REF_TABLE$)
order by A.NGAYHOADON

select distinct A.*, B.SOHOADON AS HOADONLIENQUAN, bn.MAYTE , CASE NVL(TOCHAR(BN.NGAYSINH),'') WHEN '' THEN TO_CHAR(BN.NAMSINH) ELSE TO_CHAR(BN.NGAYSINH, 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS NAMSINH, ntba.SOBENHAN, bn.TENBENHNHAN , ntba.TRANGTHAI as TRANGTHAINOITRU, tn.TRANGTHAI as TRANGTHAINGOAITRU from TT_HOADON A LEFT JOIN TT_HOADON B ON A.HOADONLIENQUAN_ID = B.HOADON_ID inner join TT_HOADON_CHITIET_NGOAITRU VP on VP.HOADON_ID = A.HOADON_ID left join TT_TIEPNHAN tn on tn.TIEPNHAN_ID = a.TIEPNHAN_ID left join TT_BENHNHAN bn on bn.BENHNHAN_ID = A.BENHNHAN_ID left join TT_NOITRU_BENHAN ntba on ntba.TIEPNHAN_ID = a.TIEPNHAN_ID
A.DATHANHTOAN = '$DATHANHTOAN$' and (A.HUYHOADON is null or A.HUYHOADON = '0') and (A.HOANTRA is null or A.HOANTRA = '0')
A.HUYHOADON = '$HUYHOADON$'
A.HOANTRA = '$HOANTRA$'
A.DATHANHTOAN = 0
)
A.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
A.SOHOADON like '%$TUKHOA$%'
(bn.TENBENHNHAN like '%$TENBENHNHAN$%' or bn.MAYTE like '%$TENBENHNHAN$%')
TRUNC(A.NGAYHOADON) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)
A.TRANGTHAI = '$TRANGTHAI$'
(A.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$USER_ID$' or A.NGUOITAO_ID = '$USER_ID$')
(VP.REF_TABLE = '$REF_TABLE$')
(VP.REF_TABLE in ($LIST_REF_TABLE$))
A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by A.NGAYHOADON

select A.*, B.SOHOADON AS HOADONLIENQUAN, bn.MAYTE , CASE NVL(TO_CHAR(BN.NGAYSINH),'') WHEN '' THEN TO_CHAR(BN.NAMSINH) ELSE TO_CHAR(BN.NGAYSINH, 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS NAMSINH, ntba.SOBENHAN, bn.TENBENHNHAN, bn.DIACHITHUONGTRU as DIACHI , ntba.TRANGTHAI as TRANGTHAINOITRU, tn.TRANGTHAI as TRANGTHAINGOAITRU , dt.MADOITUONG,gt.DESCRIPTION as GIOITINH, ntba.LOAIBENHAN from TT_HOADON A LEFT JOIN TT_HOADON B ON A.HOADONLIENQUAN_ID = B.HOADON_ID left join TT_TIEPNHAN tn on (tn.TIEPNHAN_ID = a.TIEPNHAN_ID or tn.BENHNHAN_ID = a.BENHNHAN_ID) left join TM_DOITUONG DT on DT.DOITUONG_ID = tn.doituong_id left join TT_BENHNHAN bn on bn.BENHNHAN_ID = tn.benhnhan_id left join TT_NOITRU_BENHAN ntba on ntba.TIEPNHAN_ID = a.TIEPNHAN_ID left join TM_GENDER gt on gt.ID = bn.GIOITINH
A.DATHANHTOAN = '$DATHANHTOAN$'
A.HUYHOADON = '$HUYHOADON$'
A.HOANTRA = '$HOANTRA$'
A.DATHANHTOAN = 0
)
A.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
A.SOHOADON like '%$TUKHOA$%'
(bn.TENBENHNHAN like '%$TENBENHNHAN$%' or bn.MAYTE like '%$TENBENHNHAN$%')
TRUNC(A.THOIGIAN_GHINHANHUY) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)
A.TRANGTHAI = '$TRANGTHAI$'
(A.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$USER_ID$' or A.NGUOITAO_ID = '$USER_ID$')
A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
and a.HOADON_ID not in ( select vp.HOADON_ID from TT_VIENPHI vp where vp.REF_TABLE like '%TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU%' and vp.HOADON_ID is not null and vp.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' ) order by A.NGAYHOADON

select A.*, B.SOHOADON AS HOADONLIENQUAN, bn.MAYTE , CASE NVL(TO_CHAR(BN.NGAYSINH),'') WHEN '' THEN TO_CHAR(BN.NAMSINH) ELSE TO_CHAR(BN.NGAYSINH, 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS NAMSINH, ntba.SOBENHAN, bn.TENBENHNHAN, bn.DIACHITHUONGTRU as DIACHI , ntba.TRANGTHAI as TRANGTHAINOITRU, tn.TRANGTHAI as TRANGTHAINGOAITRU , dt.MADOITUONG,gt.DESCRIPTION as GIOITINH, ntba.LOAIBENHAN from TT_HOADON A LEFT JOIN TT_HOADON B ON A.HOADONLIENQUAN_ID = B.HOADON_ID left join TT_TIEPNHAN tn on (tn.TIEPNHAN_ID = a.TIEPNHAN_ID or tn.BENHNHAN_ID = a.BENHNHAN_ID) left join TM_DOITUONG DT on DT.DOITUONG_ID = tn.doituong_id left join TT_BENHNHAN bn on bn.BENHNHAN_ID = tn.benhnhan_id left join TT_NOITRU_BENHAN ntba on ntba.TIEPNHAN_ID = a.TIEPNHAN_ID left join TM_GENDER gt on gt.ID = bn.GIOITINH
A.DATHANHTOAN = '$DATHANHTOAN$'
A.HUYHOADON = '$HUYHOADON$'
A.HOANTRA = '$HOANTRA$'
A.DATHANHTOAN = 0
)
A.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
A.SOHOADON like '%$TUKHOA$%'
(bn.TENBENHNHAN like '%$TENBENHNHAN$%' or bn.MAYTE like '%$TENBENHNHAN$%')
TRUNC(A.THOIGIAN_DUYET_HUY) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)
A.TRANGTHAI = '$TRANGTHAI$'
(A.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$USER_ID$' or A.NGUOITAO_ID = '$USER_ID$')
A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
and a.HOADON_ID not in ( select vp.HOADON_ID from TT_VIENPHI vp where vp.REF_TABLE like '%TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU%' and vp.HOADON_ID is not null and vp.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' ) order by A.NGAYHOADON

select * from TT_HOADON
TT_HOADON.HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$'
TT_HOADON.SOHOADON = '$SOHOADON$'
TT_HOADON.LOAIHOADON = '$LOAIHOADON$'
TT_HOADON.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
TT_HOADON.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
TT_HOADON.DOITUONG_ID = '$DOITUONG_ID$'
TT_HOADON.BENHAN_NGOAITRU_ID = '$BENHAN_NGOAITRU_ID$'
TT_HOADON.NGAYPHATSINH = '$NGAYPHATSINH$'
TT_HOADON.NGAYHOADON = '$NGAYHOADON$'
TT_HOADON.NOIPHATSINH_ID = '$NOIPHATSINH_ID$'
TT_HOADON.NGUOILAP_ID = '$NGUOILAP_ID$'
TT_HOADON.NOITHUTIEN_ID = '$NOITHUTIEN_ID$'
TT_HOADON.NGUOITHUTIEN_ID = '$NGUOITHUTIEN_ID$'
TT_HOADON.NOITRA_ID = '$NOITRA_ID$'
TT_HOADON.NGUOITRA_ID = '$NGUOITRA_ID$'
TT_HOADON.NGAYTRA = '$NGAYTRA$'
TT_HOADON.GIATRIHOADON = '$GIATRIHOADON$'
TT_HOADON.GIATRITHUCTHU = '$GIATRITHUCTHU$'
TT_HOADON.TIENTE_ID = '$TIENTE_ID$'
TT_HOADON.TYGIA = '$TYGIA$'
TT_HOADON.GIATRIVND = '$GIATRIVND$'
TT_HOADON.DANGKYHOADON_ID = '$DANGKYHOADON_ID$'
TT_HOADON.SOSERIEVAT = '$SOSERIEVAT$'
TT_HOADON.SOHOADONVAT = '$SOHOADONVAT$'
TT_HOADON.GIATRIVAT = '$GIATRIVAT$'
TT_HOADON.NGOAIGIO = '$NGOAIGIO$'
TT_HOADON.THUHD_BL = '$THUHD_BL$'
TT_HOADON.GHICHU = '$GHICHU$'
TT_HOADON.TRANGTHAI = '$TRANGTHAI$'
TT_HOADON.DATHANHTOAN = '$DATHANHTOAN$'
TT_HOADON.HUYHOADON = '$HUYHOADON$'
TT_HOADON.LYDOHUY_ID = '$LYDOHUY_ID$'
TT_HOADON.HOANTRA = '$HOANTRA$'
TT_HOADON.IDCHUYEN = '$IDCHUYEN$'
TT_HOADON.IDCHUYENHUY = '$IDCHUYENHUY$'
TT_HOADON.IDCHUYENHOAN = '$IDCHUYENHOAN$'
TT_HOADON.HOADONLIENQUAN_ID = '$HOADONLIENQUAN_ID$'
TT_HOADON.TRANSFER_VIENPHI_ID = '$TRANSFER_VIENPHI_ID$'
TT_HOADON.NGAYKHOAGOI = '$NGAYKHOAGOI$'
TT_HOADON.NHOMTHANHTOAN_ID = '$NHOMTHANHTOAN_ID$'
TT_HOADON.HOADONDOIUNG = '$HOADONDOIUNG$'
TT_HOADON.CHUYENCHUNGTUID = '$CHUYENCHUNGTUID$'
TT_HOADON.CHUYENCHUNGTUHOANID = '$CHUYENCHUNGTUHOANID$'
TT_HOADON.CHUYENCHUNGTUHUYID = '$CHUYENCHUNGTUHUYID$'
TT_HOADON.CHUYENDOANHTHUID = '$CHUYENDOANHTHUID$'
TT_HOADON.CHUYENDOANHTHUHOANID = '$CHUYENDOANHTHUHOANID$'
TT_HOADON.CHUYENDOANHTHUHUYID = '$CHUYENDOANHTHUHUYID$'
TT_HOADON.KH_TENCONGTY = '$KH_TENCONGTY$'
TT_HOADON.KH_MASOTHUE = '$KH_MASOTHUE$'
TT_HOADON.KH_DIACHI = '$KH_DIACHI$'
TT_HOADON.KH_NGUOIDAIDIEN = '$KH_NGUOIDAIDIEN$'
TT_HOADON.INLAI = '$INLAI$'
TT_HOADON.INLAI_USER_ID = '$INLAI_USER_ID$'
TT_HOADON.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
TRUNC(TT_HOADON.NGAYTAO) = TRUNC(#NGAYTAO#)
TT_HOADON.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TRUNC(TT_HOADON.NGAYCAPNHAT) = TRUNC(#NGAYCAPNHAT#)
TT_HOADON.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
order by HOADON_ID

select bn.MAYTE,hd.* from TT_HOADON hd left join TT_BENHNHAN bn on bn.BENHNHAN_ID = hd.BENHNHAN_ID
hd.HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$'
hd.HOADON_ID in ($LIST_BIENLAI$)
hd.BENHVIEN_ID ='$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by hd.HOADON_ID

select bn.MAYTE,hd.* from TT_HOADON hd left join TT_BENHNHAN bn on bn.BENHNHAN_ID = hd.BENHNHAN_ID where hd.HOADON_ID in ($LIST_BIENLAI$) and hd.BENHVIEN_ID ='$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by hd.HOADON_ID

select distinct bn.MAYTE,ct.NGOAITRU_TOATHUOC_NGUOIMUA_ID, ct.SOCHUNGTU, ct.CHUNGTU_ID,hd.* from TT_HOADON hd left join TT_HOADON_CHITIET_NGOAITRU hdct on hdct.HOADON_ID = hd.HOADON_ID and ref_table = 'TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU_CHITIET' left join TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU_CHITIET ctct on ctct.CHUNGTUCHITIET_ID = hdct.REF_ID left join TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU ct on ct.CHUNGTU_ID = ctct.chungtu_id left join TT_BENHNHAN bn on bn.BENHNHAN_ID = hd.BENHNHAN_ID where hd.HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$' and hd.BENHVIEN_ID ='$BENHVIEN_ID$' order by hd.HOADON_ID

select * from TT_HOADON
TT_HOADON.HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$'
order by HOADON_ID
statements.insert:
select TT_HOADON_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_HOADON ( HOADON_ID , SOHOADON , LOAIHOADON , TIEPNHAN_ID , BENHNHAN_ID , BENHAN_ID , DOITUONG_ID , BENHAN_NGOAITRU_ID , NGAYPHATSINH , NGAYHOADON , NOIPHATSINH_ID , NGUOILAP_ID , NOITHUTIEN_ID , NGUOITHUTIEN_ID , NOITRA_ID , NGUOITRA_ID , NGAYTRA , GIATRIHOADON , GIATRITHUCTHU , TIENTE_ID , TYGIA , GIATRIVND , DANGKYHOADON_ID , SOSERIEVAT , SOHOADONVAT , GIATRIVAT , NGOAIGIO , THUHD_BL , GHICHU , TRANGTHAI , DATHANHTOAN , HUYHOADON , LYDOHUY_ID , HOANTRA , IDCHUYEN , IDCHUYENHUY , IDCHUYENHOAN , HOADONLIENQUAN_ID , TRANSFER_VIENPHI_ID , NGAYKHOAGOI , NHOMTHANHTOAN_ID , HOADONDOIUNG , CHUYENCHUNGTUID , CHUYENCHUNGTUHOANID , CHUYENCHUNGTUHUYID , CHUYENDOANHTHUID , CHUYENDOANHTHUHOANID , CHUYENDOANHTHUHUYID , KH_TENCONGTY , KH_MASOTHUE , KH_DIACHI , KH_NGUOIDAIDIEN , INLAI , INLAI_USER_ID
, NGUOI_GHINHANHUY_ID , THOIGIAN_GHINHANHUY
, BENHVIEN_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID ) values ( #ID# , #SOHOADON# , #LOAIHOADON# , #TIEPNHAN_ID# , #BENHNHAN_ID# , #BENHAN_ID# , #DOITUONG_ID# , #BENHAN_NGOAITRU_ID# , #NGAYPHATSINH# , #NGAYHOADON# , #NOIPHATSINH_ID# , #NGUOILAP_ID# , #NOITHUTIEN_ID# , #NGUOITHUTIEN_ID# , #NOITRA_ID# , #NGUOITRA_ID# , #NGAYTRA# , #GIATRIHOADON# , #GIATRITHUCTHU# , #TIENTE_ID# , #TYGIA# , #GIATRIVND# , #DANGKYHOADON_ID# , #SOSERIEVAT# , #SOHOADONVAT# , #GIATRIVAT# , #NGOAIGIO# , #THUHD_BL# , #GHICHU# , #TRANGTHAI# , #DATHANHTOAN# , #HUYHOADON# , #LYDOHUY_ID# , #HOANTRA# , #IDCHUYEN# , #IDCHUYENHUY# , #IDCHUYENHOAN# , #HOADONLIENQUAN_ID# , #TRANSFER_VIENPHI_ID# , #NGAYKHOAGOI# , #NHOMTHANHTOAN_ID# , #HOADONDOIUNG# , #CHUYENCHUNGTUID# , #CHUYENCHUNGTUHOANID# , #CHUYENCHUNGTUHUYID# , #CHUYENDOANHTHUID# , #CHUYENDOANHTHUHOANID# , #CHUYENDOANHTHUHUYID# , #KH_TENCONGTY# , #KH_MASOTHUE# , #KH_DIACHI# , #KH_NGUOIDAIDIEN# , #INLAI# , #INLAI_USER_ID#
, #NGUOI_GHINHANHUY_ID# , #THOIGIAN_GHINHANHUY#
, #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# )
statements.update:
update TT_HOADON set SOHOADON = #SOHOADON# , LOAIHOADON = #LOAIHOADON# , TIEPNHAN_ID = #TIEPNHAN_ID# , BENHNHAN_ID = #BENHNHAN_ID# , DOITUONG_ID = #DOITUONG_ID# , BENHAN_NGOAITRU_ID = #BENHAN_NGOAITRU_ID# , NGAYPHATSINH = #NGAYPHATSINH# , NGAYHOADON = #NGAYHOADON# , NOIPHATSINH_ID = #NOIPHATSINH_ID# , NGUOILAP_ID = #NGUOILAP_ID# , NOITHUTIEN_ID = #NOITHUTIEN_ID# , NGUOITHUTIEN_ID = #NGUOITHUTIEN_ID# , NOITRA_ID = #NOITRA_ID# , NGUOITRA_ID = #NGUOITRA_ID# , NGAYTRA = #NGAYTRA# , GIATRIHOADON = #GIATRIHOADON# , GIATRITHUCTHU = #GIATRITHUCTHU# , TIENTE_ID = #TIENTE_ID# , TYGIA = #TYGIA# , GIATRIVND = #GIATRIVND# , DANGKYHOADON_ID = #DANGKYHOADON_ID# , SOSERIEVAT = #SOSERIEVAT# , SOHOADONVAT = #SOHOADONVAT# , GIATRIVAT = #GIATRIVAT# , NGOAIGIO = #NGOAIGIO# , THUHD_BL = #THUHD_BL# , GHICHU = #GHICHU# , TRANGTHAI = #TRANGTHAI# , DATHANHTOAN = #DATHANHTOAN# , HUYHOADON = #HUYHOADON# , LYDOHUY_ID = #LYDOHUY_ID# , HOANTRA = #HOANTRA# , IDCHUYEN = #IDCHUYEN# , IDCHUYENHUY = #IDCHUYENHUY# , IDCHUYENHOAN = #IDCHUYENHOAN# , HOADONLIENQUAN_ID = #HOADONLIENQUAN_ID# , TRANSFER_VIENPHI_ID = #TRANSFER_VIENPHI_ID# , NGAYKHOAGOI = #NGAYKHOAGOI# , NHOMTHANHTOAN_ID = #NHOMTHANHTOAN_ID# , HOADONDOIUNG = #HOADONDOIUNG# , CHUYENCHUNGTUID = #CHUYENCHUNGTUID# , CHUYENCHUNGTUHOANID = #CHUYENCHUNGTUHOANID# , CHUYENCHUNGTUHUYID = #CHUYENCHUNGTUHUYID# , CHUYENDOANHTHUID = #CHUYENDOANHTHUID# , CHUYENDOANHTHUHOANID = #CHUYENDOANHTHUHOANID# , CHUYENDOANHTHUHUYID = #CHUYENDOANHTHUHUYID# , KH_TENCONGTY = #KH_TENCONGTY# , KH_MASOTHUE = #KH_MASOTHUE# , KH_DIACHI = #KH_DIACHI# , KH_NGUOIDAIDIEN = #KH_NGUOIDAIDIEN# , INLAI = #INLAI# , INLAI_USER_ID = #INLAI_USER_ID#
, NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# where HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$'
update TT_HOADON set HOADONLIENQUAN_ID = #HOADON_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# where HOADON_ID IN ($LIST_HOADON_ID$)

) a left join ( select vp.HOADON_ID, vp.REF_ID ,sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_BH from TT_MIENGIAM MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID left join TT_VIENPHI vp on vp.VIENPHI_ID = mgct.VIENPHI_ID where MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 and vp.HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$' group by vp.HOADON_ID, vp.REF_ID )b on b.HOADON_ID = a.HOADON_ID and b.REF_ID = a.REF_ID
left join ( select vp.HOADON_ID, vp.REF_ID ,sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_BHTN from TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID left join TT_VIENPHI vp on vp.VIENPHI_ID = mgct.VIENPHI_ID where MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 and vp.HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$' group by vp.HOADON_ID, vp.REF_ID )c on c.HOADON_ID = a.HOADON_ID and c.REF_ID = a.REF_ID left join ( select vp.HOADON_ID, vp.REF_ID, sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_THANHVIEN from TT_MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID left join TT_VIENPHI vp on vp.VIENPHI_ID = mgct.VIENPHI_ID where MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 and vp.HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$' group by vp.HOADON_ID, vp.REF_ID )f on f.HOADON_ID = a.HOADON_ID and f.REF_ID = a.REF_ID

) a left join ( select vp.HOADON_ID, vp.REF_ID ,sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_BH from TT_MIENGIAM MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID left join TT_VIENPHI vp on vp.VIENPHI_ID = mgct.VIENPHI_ID where MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 and vp.HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$' group by vp.HOADON_ID, vp.REF_ID )b on b.HOADON_ID = a.HOADON_ID and b.REF_ID = a.REF_ID
left join ( select vp.HOADON_ID, vp.REF_ID ,sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_BHTN from TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID left join TT_VIENPHI vp on vp.VIENPHI_ID = mgct.VIENPHI_ID where MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 and vp.HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$' group by vp.HOADON_ID, vp.REF_ID )c on c.HOADON_ID = a.HOADON_ID and c.REF_ID = a.REF_ID left join ( select vp.HOADON_ID, vp.REF_ID, sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_THANHVIEN from TT_MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID left join TT_VIENPHI vp on vp.VIENPHI_ID = mgct.VIENPHI_ID where MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 and vp.HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$' group by vp.HOADON_ID, vp.REF_ID )f on f.HOADON_ID = a.HOADON_ID and f.REF_ID = a.REF_ID
select * from TT_HOADON_CHITIET_NOITRU where TT_HOADON_CHITIET_NOITRU.HOADON_CHITIET_NOITRU_ID = '$value$' order by HOADON_CHITIET_NOITRU_ID

update TT_VIENPHI set TIEPNHAN_ID = #TIEPNHAN_ID# , BENHAN_ID = #BENHAN_ID# , REF_ID = #REF_ID# , REF_TABLE = #REF_TABLE# , DICHVU_ID = #DICHVU_ID# , DUOC_ID = #DUOC_ID# , LOAI_CHIPHI = #LOAI_CHIPHI# , LOAIGIA_ID = #LOAIGIA_ID# , SOLUONG = #SOLUONG# , DONGIA_DOANHTHU = #DONGIA_DOANHTHU# , THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU = #THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU# , BHYT_TL = #BHYT_TL# , BHYT_DONGIA = #BHYT_DONGIA# , BHYT_THANHTIEN = #BHYT_THANHTIEN# , BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA = #BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA# , BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = #BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA# , BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN = #BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN# , GIATRI_HOADON = #GIATRI_HOADON# , GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN = #GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN# , GIATRI_BIENLAI = #GIATRI_BIENLAI# , GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN = #GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN# , GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN = #GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN# , GIATRI_THATTHU = #GIATRI_THATTHU# , MIENGIAM_TL = #MIENGIAM_TL# , MIENGIAM_GIATRI = #MIENGIAM_GIATRI# , NGANSACH_TL = #NGANSACH_TL# , NGANSACH_GIATRI = #NGANSACH_GIATRI# , TAITRO_TL = #TAITRO_TL# , TAITRO_GIATRI = #TAITRO_GIATRI# , BHTN_TL = #BHTN_TL# , BHTN_DONGIA = #BHTN_DONGIA# , BHTN_THANHTIEN = #BHTN_THANHTIEN# , BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA = #BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA# , BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = #BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA# , DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN = #DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN# , HUY = #HUY# , DATHANHTOAN = #DATHANHTOAN# , DATHUCHIEN = #DATHUCHIEN# , KHONGTHUTIEN = #KHONGTHUTIEN# , HOADON_ID = #HOADON_ID# , ACTIVE = #ACTIVE#
, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where VIENPHI_ID = '$VIENPHI_ID$'
update TT_VIENPHI set KHONGTHUTIEN = #KHONGTHUTIEN# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where VIENPHI_ID = '$VIENPHI_ID$'
update TT_HOADON set TT_HOADON.INLAI = #INLAI# where TT_HOADON.SOHOADON = '$SOHOADON$'
statements.statement: SELECT * FROM TT_VIENPHI WHERE HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$' AND DATHUCHIEN = 0
select * from TT_HOADON_CHITIET_NGOAITRU where HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$' AND TRANGTHAI = 'CHUATHUCHIEN'
SELECT VIENPHI_ID FROM TT_VIENPHI WHERE DATHANHTOAN = 0 and ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM TT_VIENPHI WHERE HUY = 0 and HOADON_ID IS NOT NULL and DATHANHTOAN = 1

a left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_BH from TT_MIENGIAM MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 group by VIENPHI_ID )b on a.VIENPHI_ID = b.VIENPHI_ID
left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_BHTN from TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 group by VIENPHI_ID )c on a.VIENPHI_ID = c.VIENPHI_ID left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_THANHVIEN from TT_MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 group by VIENPHI_ID )f on a.VIENPHI_ID = f.VIENPHI_ID order by HOADONCHITIET_ID

select a.*, b.GIATRIMIENGIAM_BH, c.GIATRIMIENGIAM_BHTN, f.GIATRIMIENGIAM_THANHVIEN from ( select hd.*,hdct.VIENPHI_ID,hdct.DICHVU_ID, hdct.DUOC_ID, hdct.SOLUONG, hdct.DONGIA_DOANHTHU , hdct.LOAIGIA_ID, hdct.BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN , c.TRANGTHAI as TRANGTHAI_DVYC from TT_HOADON hd left join (select * from TT_HOADON_CHITIET_NGOAITRU where HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$') hdct on hdct.HOADON_ID = hd.HOADON_ID left join (select * from TT_DVYEUCAU where TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$') c on c.DVYEUCAU_ID = hdct.REF_ID and hdct.DICHVU_ID is not null

left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_BHTN from TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_BHTN_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_BHTN' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 group by VIENPHI_ID )c on a.VIENPHI_ID = c.VIENPHI_ID left join ( select VIENPHI_ID, sum(MGCT.GIATRIMIENGIAM) AS GIATRIMIENGIAM_THANHVIEN from TT_MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN MG INNER JOIN TT_MIENGIAM_CHITIET MGCT ON MG.MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN_ID = MGCT.MIENGIAM_ID where MG.TIEPNHAN_ID= '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and MGCT.REF_TABLE = 'TT_MIENGIAM_THANHVIEN' and MG.TINHTRANG = 1 group by VIENPHI_ID )f on a.VIENPHI_ID = f.VIENPHI_ID

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED; if(select count(*) from tt_vienphi where vienphi_id in ($LIST_VIENPHI$) and (DATHANHTOAN = 0 or (Dathanhtoan = 1 and GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN < BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN)) ) = $SL$ BEGIN BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION UPDATE TT_VIENPHI SET Dathanhtoan = '1', GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN = BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN WHERE vienphi_id IN ($LIST_VIENPHI$) SELECT 1 as result COMMIT TRANSACTION END TRY
BEGIN CATCH IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SELECT -1 as result END CATCH END ELSE SELECT 0 AS RESULT

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED; if(select distinct huy from tt_vienphi where hoadon_id = $HOADON_ID$) = 0 BEGIN BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION UPDATE TT_VIENPHI SET Huy = '1' WHERE hoadon_id = $HOADON_ID$ SELECT 1 as result COMMIT TRANSACTION END TRY
BEGIN CATCH IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SELECT -1 as result END CATCH END ELSE SELECT 0 AS RESULT

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED; if(select HUYHOADON from TT_HOADON where hoadon_id = $HOADON_ID$) = 0 BEGIN BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION UPDATE TT_HOADON SET HUYHOADON = '1' WHERE hoadon_id = $HOADON_ID$ SELECT 1 as result COMMIT TRANSACTION END TRY
BEGIN CATCH IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SELECT -1 as result END CATCH END ELSE SELECT 0 AS RESULT
UPDATE TT_HOADON SET TRANGTHAI = 'DAHOANUNG' WHERE HOADON_ID IN ($LIST_HOADON$)

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED; declare @HU int select @HU = count(*) from TT_HOADON A where hoadon_id in ($LIST_HOADON$) and (TRANGTHAI = 'DAHOANUNG')
if @HU = 0 BEGIN BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION UPDATE TT_HOADON SET TRANGTHAI = 'DAHOANUNG' WHERE HOADON_ID IN ($LIST_HOADON$) SELECT 1 as result COMMIT TRANSACTION END TRY
BEGIN CATCH IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SELECT -1 as result END CATCH END ELSE if @HU = '$SL$' SELECT 2 AS RESULT else select 0 as RESULT

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED; if(select distinct Huy from tt_vienphi where hoadon_id = $HOADON_ID$) = 0 BEGIN BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION UPDATE TT_VIENPHI SET Huy = '1' WHERE hoadon_id = $HOADON_ID$ SELECT 1 as result COMMIT TRANSACTION END TRY
BEGIN CATCH IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SELECT -1 as result END CATCH END ELSE SELECT 0 AS RESULT

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED; if(select HOANTRA from TT_HOADON where hoadon_id = $HOADON_ID$) = 0 BEGIN BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION UPDATE TT_HOADON SET HOANTRA = '1' WHERE hoadon_id = $HOADON_ID$ SELECT 1 as result COMMIT TRANSACTION END TRY
BEGIN CATCH IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SELECT -1 as result END CATCH END ELSE SELECT 0 AS RESULT

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED; if(select count(*) from tt_vienphi where hoadon_id in ($LIST_BIENLAI$) and Huy = 1) = 0 BEGIN BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION UPDATE TT_VIENPHI SET Huy = '1' WHERE hoadon_id in ($LIST_BIENLAI$) SELECT 1 as result COMMIT TRANSACTION END TRY
BEGIN CATCH IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SELECT -1 as result END CATCH END ELSE SELECT 0 AS RESULT
select distinct DICHVU_ID, DVYEUCAU_ID from TT_DVYEUCAU where KHAMBENH_NGOAITRU_ID in (select KHAMBENH_ID from TT_NGOAITRU_TOATHUOC where TOATHUOC_ID = '$REF_ID$')
